a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Change in share of adults who are overweight or obese
"Overweight" is defined here as a body mass index (BMI) above 25. BMI is a person's weight in kilograms
divided by their height in meters squared.
Data source: World Health Organization - Global Health Observatory (2024)
Note: To allow for comparisons between countries and over time, this metric is age-standardized.
